products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash sloe purple roller blind in purple. Made to measure from 8.83 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This beautiful and elegant range comes in a variety of colours to choose from that will look good in any room. Their splash sloe roller blind in an attractive purple colour is a perfect choice to help you transform your space.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1575 fabric colour: sloe material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash smokey purple roller blind in purple. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This dark smokey purple roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This rich smokey purple fabric will look stunning paired with dark wooden tones, alternatively you could add a touch of opulence to the finish by pairing with luxurious emerald greens. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2069 fabric colour: smokey purple material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.productdescription:
Splash orchid purple is a lush purple/pink shade roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.This light-filtering, dim-out fabric is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. This fabulous made to measure roller blind is great for adding a splash of colour into kitchens, as this fabric is moisture-resistant
